com.threerings.gwt.util
Class Functions

java.lang.Object
  com.threerings.gwt.util.Functions

public class Functions
extends Object

A collection of general purpose functions. To be replaced by Google Collections when same is usable via GWT.

Method Detail

forMap

public static <K,V> Function<K,V> forMap(Map<K,? extends V> map,
                                         V defaultValue)
Returns a function which performs a map lookup with a default value. The function created by this method returns defaultValue for all inputs that do not belong to the map's key set.

forPredicate

public static <T> Function<T,Boolean> forPredicate(Predicate<T> predicate)
Returns a function that returns the same boolean output as the given predicate for all inputs.
